data_red_dir.comment: Directory path for the top-level data reduction area

log_dir.comment: Directory path for the logging output

config_dir.comment: Directory path for the configuration files for the pipeline

phot_db_dir.comment: Directory path for the directory holding the photometry databases

software_dir.comment: Directory path for the pipeline software

group_processing_limit.comment: Maximum number of data groups to process at any one time

catalog_xmatch.comment: Switch to enable the cross-match against a catalog

use_gaia_phot.comment: Switch to enable use of Gaia photometry for calibration
